019package org.jdrupes.vmoperator.runner.qemu;
020
021import com.google.gson.JsonObject;
022import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.ApiException;
023import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.apis.ApiextensionsV1Api;
024import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.models.V1CustomResourceDefinitionVersion;
025import io.kubernetes.client.util.Config;
026import io.kubernetes.client.util.generic.dynamic.DynamicKubernetesApi;
027import io.kubernetes.client.util.generic.dynamic.DynamicKubernetesObject;
028import java.io.IOException;
029import java.nio.file.Files;
030import java.nio.file.Path;
031import java.time.Instant;
032import java.util.Map;
033import java.util.Optional;
034import java.util.Set;
035import java.util.logging.Level;
036import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.runner.qemu.events.RunnerConfigurationUpdate;
037import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.runner.qemu.events.RunnerStateChange;
038import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.runner.qemu.events.RunnerStateChange.State;
039import static org.jdrupes.vmoperator.util.Constants.VM_OP_CRD_NAME;
040import static org.jdrupes.vmoperator.util.Constants.VM_OP_GROUP;
041import org.jgrapes.core.Channel;
042import org.jgrapes.core.Component;
043import org.jgrapes.core.annotation.Handler;
044import org.jgrapes.core.events.Start;
045import org.jgrapes.util.events.ConfigurationUpdate;
046import org.jgrapes.util.events.InitialConfiguration;
047
048/**
049 * Updates the CR status.
050 */
051public class StatusUpdater extends Component {
052
053    private static final Set<State> RUNNING_STATES
054        = Set.of(State.RUNNING, State.TERMINATING);
055
056    private String namespace;
057    private String vmName;
058    private DynamicKubernetesApi vmCrApi;
059    private long observedGeneration;
060
061    /**
062     * Instantiates a new status updater.
063     *
064     * @param componentChannel the component channel
065     */
066    public StatusUpdater(Channel componentChannel) {
067        super(componentChannel);
068    }
069
070    /**
071     * On configuration update.
072     *
073     * @param event the event
074     */
075    @Handler
076    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
077    public void onConfigurationUpdate(ConfigurationUpdate event) {
078        event.structured("/Runner").ifPresent(c -> {
079            if (event instanceof InitialConfiguration) {
080                namespace = (String) c.get("namespace");
081                updateNamespace();
082                vmName = Optional.ofNullable((Map<String, String>) c.get("vm"))
083                    .map(vm -> vm.get("name")).orElse(null);
084            }
085        });
086    }
087
088    private void updateNamespace() {
089        if (namespace == null) {
090            var path = Path
091                .of("/var/run/secrets/kubernetes.io/serviceaccount/namespace");
092            if (Files.isReadable(path)) {
093                try {
094                    namespace = Files.lines(path).findFirst().orElse(null);
095                } catch (IOException e) {
096                    logger.log(Level.WARNING, e,
097                        () -> "Cannot read namespace.");
098                }
099            }
100        }
101        if (namespace == null) {
102            logger.warning(() -> "Namespace is unknown, some functions"
103                + " won't be available.");
104        }
105    }
106
107    /**
108     * Handle the start event.
109     *
110     * @param event the event
111     */
112    @Handler
113    @SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.DataflowAnomalyAnalysis",
114        "PMD.AvoidInstantiatingObjectsInLoops" })
115    public void onStart(Start event) {
116        try {
117            var client = Config.defaultClient();
118            var extsApi = new ApiextensionsV1Api(client);
119            var crds = extsApi.listCustomResourceDefinition(null, null, null,
120                "metadata.name=" + VM_OP_CRD_NAME, null, null, null,
121                null, null, null);
122            if (crds.getItems().isEmpty()) {
123                logger.warning(() -> "CRD is unknown, status will not"
124                    + " be updated.");
125                return;
126            }
127            var crd = crds.getItems().get(0);
128            if (crd.getSpec().getVersions().stream()
129                .filter(v -> v.getSubresources() == null).findAny()
130                .isPresent()) {
131                logger.warning(() -> "You are using an old version of the CRD,"
132                    + " status will not be updated.");
133                return;
134            }
135            var crdPlural = crd.getSpec().getNames().getPlural();
136            var vmOpApiVersions = crd.getSpec().getVersions().stream()
137                .map(V1CustomResourceDefinitionVersion::getName).toList();
138            for (var apiVer : vmOpApiVersions) {
139                var api = new DynamicKubernetesApi(VM_OP_GROUP, apiVer,
140                    crdPlural, client);
141                var res = api.get(namespace, vmName);
142                if (res.isSuccess()) {
143                    vmCrApi = api;
144                    observedGeneration
145                        = res.getObject().getMetadata().getGeneration();
146                    break;
147                }
148            }
149            if (vmCrApi == null) {
150                logger.warning(() -> "VM's CR is unknown, status will not"
151                    + " be updated.");
152            }
153        } catch (IOException | ApiException e) {
154            logger.log(Level.WARNING, e, () -> "Cannot access kubernetes: "
155                + e.getMessage());
156        }
157    }
158
159    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.AvoidDuplicateLiterals")
160    private JsonObject currentStatus(DynamicKubernetesObject vmCr) {
161        return vmCr.getRaw().getAsJsonObject("status").deepCopy();
162    }
163
164    /**
165     * On runner state changed.
166     *
167     * @param event the event
168    8     * @throws ApiException the api exception
169     */
170    @Handler
171    public void onRunnerStateChanged(RunnerStateChange event)
172            throws ApiException {
173        if (vmCrApi == null) {
174            return;
175        }
176        var vmCr = vmCrApi.get(namespace, vmName)
177            .throwsApiException().getObject();
178        vmCrApi.updateStatus(vmCr, from -> {
179            JsonObject status = currentStatus(from);
180            status.getAsJsonArray("conditions").asList().stream()
181                .map(cond -> (JsonObject) cond)
182                .forEach(cond -> {
183                    if ("Running".equals(cond.get("type").getAsString())) {
184                        updateRunningCondition(event, from, cond);
185                    }
186                });
187            return status;
188        });
189    }
190
191    private void updateRunningCondition(RunnerStateChange event,
192            DynamicKubernetesObject from, JsonObject cond) {
193        boolean reportedRunning
194            = "True".equals(cond.get("status").getAsString());
195        if (RUNNING_STATES.contains(event.state())
196            && !reportedRunning) {
197            cond.addProperty("status", "True");
198            cond.addProperty("lastTransitionTime",
199                Instant.now().toString());
200        }
201        if (!RUNNING_STATES.contains(event.state())
202            && reportedRunning) {
203            cond.addProperty("status", "False");
204            cond.addProperty("lastTransitionTime",
205                Instant.now().toString());
206        }
207        cond.addProperty("reason", event.reason());
208        cond.addProperty("message", event.message());
209        cond.addProperty("observedGeneration",
210            from.getMetadata().getGeneration());
211    }
212
213    /**
214     * On runner configuration update.
215     *
216     * @param event the event
217     * @throws ApiException 
218     */
219    @Handler
220    public void onRunnerConfigurationUpdate(RunnerConfigurationUpdate event)
221            throws ApiException {
222        if (vmCrApi == null) {
223            return;
224        }
225        // A change of the runner configuration is typically caused
226        // by a new version of the CR. So we observe the new CR.
227        var vmCr = vmCrApi.get(namespace, vmName).throwsApiException()
228            .getObject();
229        if (vmCr.getMetadata().getGeneration() == observedGeneration) {
230            return;
231        }
232        vmCrApi.updateStatus(vmCr, from -> {
233            JsonObject status = currentStatus(from);
234            status.getAsJsonArray("conditions").asList().stream()
235                .map(cond -> (JsonObject) cond)
236                .filter(
237                    cond -> "Running".equals(cond.get("type").getAsString()))
238                .forEach(cond -> cond.addProperty("observedGeneration",
239                    from.getMetadata().getGeneration()));
240            return status;
241        });
242    }
243
244}
